name: Gaaxya
description:
Eat all the galaxies as a Sphere before the time runs out! To start the game, please press spacebar, we forgot to add it in the game .-.

Click on W,A,S,D,E,Q for movements

Link for the zip file if can't play: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-UpGts6T3lYvkbDi6gwY3YxzX5bDjXMZ/view?usp=shari...

Game created by Jason Novio, Synthia Rao and Ryan Sefrioui, students at Concordia University. :)
